metadata.title: CVE-2021-45847 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Several missing input validations in the 3MF parser component of Slic3rlibslic3r 1.3.0 can each allow an attacker to cause an application crashusing a crafted 3MF input file.

criterions.comment: slic3r: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
